Scalable.information: An entity that can be transformed by a scale.

scale_xyz.information: Scale in the XYZ directions. Pass a number, Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

scale_x.information: Scale in the X direction. Pass a number, Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

scale_y.information: Scale in the Y direction. Pass a number, Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

scale_z.information: Scale in the Z direction. Pass a number, Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

scale_x_by_factor.information: Scale in the X direction by a multiple.

scale_y_by_factor.information: Scale in the Y direction by a multiple.

scale_z_by_factor.information: Scale in the X direction by a multiple.

scale_keep_aspect_ratio.information: Scale in one axis and maintain the others. Pass a Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

Booleanable.information: An entity that supports boolean operations: union, intersect, subtract.

Landmarkable.information: An entity that can be use landmarks.

create_landmark.information: Shortcut for creating and assigning a landmark to this entity. Returns a Landmark instance.

Mirrorable.information: An entity that can be mirrored.

mirror.information: Mirror an existing entity with respect to a landmark. If a name is provided, the mirror becomes a separate entity.

Patternable.information: An entity that can be patterned.

Subdividable.information: An entity that can be broken down or scaled up into more components.

remesh.information: Remeshing changes the shape of an entity.

subdivide.information: Subdivide an entity into more components.

decimate.information: Decimate an entity into less components.

Importable.information: An entity that can be imported from a file.

Exportable.information: An enttiy that can be exported.

export.information: Export Entity. Use the filePath to control the export type, e.g. '/path/to/cube.obj' or '/path/to/curve.svg'

Projectable.information: This entity can be projected onto a surface or accept a projection

project.information: Project another entity onto this one.

project_from.information: Projectable to project from. The other shape will be copied to this one.

native_instance.information: A cached instance of the native object. This may become stale.

rename.information: Rename the entity, with an option to rename linked landmarks and underlying data.

delete.information: Delete the entity from the scene. You may need to delete an associated joint or other features.

is_visible.information: Returns whether the entity is visible in the scene.

set_visible.information: Toggles visibility of an entity in the scene.

apply.information: Apply any modifications. This is application specific, but a general function is that it finalizes any changes made to an entity.

get_native_instance.information: Get the native API's object instance. For example, in Blender API, this would return a bpy.object instance.

get_location_world.information: Get the entities XYZ location relative to World Space.

get_location_local.information: Get the entities XYZ location relative to Local Space.

translate_xyz.information: Translate in the XYZ directions. Pass a number, Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

translate_x.information: Translate in the X direction. Pass a number or Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to translate to a specific length.

translate_y.information: Translate in the Y direction. Pass a number or Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to translate to a specific length.

translate_z.information: Translate in the z direction. Pass a number or Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to translate to a specific length.

rotate_xyz.information: Rotate in the XYZ direction. Default units is degrees. Pass in a number, Angle or Angle-String (e.g. 'PI/4radians' or 'PI/4r' or '90d'

rotate_x.information: Rotate in the X direction. Default units is degrees. Pass in a number, Angle or Angle-String (e.g. 'PI/4radians' or 'PI/4r' or '90d'

rotate_y.information: Rotate in the Y direction. Default units is degrees. Pass in a number, Angle or Angle-String (e.g. 'PI/4radians' or 'PI/4r' or '90d'

rotate_z.information: Rotate in the Z direction. Default units is degrees. Pass in a number, Angle or Angle-String (e.g. 'PI/4radians' or 'PI/4r' or '90d'

get_bounding_box.information: Get the Boundary Box around the entity.

get_dimensions.information: Get the bounding-box dimensions in each axis (X,Y,Z).

Part.information: Capabilities related to creating and manipulating 3D shapes.

create_cube.information: Adds cuboid geometry to a part.

create_cone.information: Adds cone geometry to a part.

create_cylinder.information: Adds cylinder geometry to a part.

create_torus.information: Adds torus geometry to a part.

create_sphere.information: Adds sphere geometry to a part.

create_gear.information: Adds gear geometry to a part.

create_text.information: Add 3D text. This is a shortcut for quickly extruding Sktech.create_text. Use a sketch for more flexibility.

clone.information: Clone an existing Part with its geometry and properties. Returns the new Part.

hollow.information: Remove vertices, if necessary, until the part has a specified wall thickness.

thicken.information: Uniformly add a wall around a Part.

twist.information: AKA Helix, Screw. Revolve an entity

set_material.information: Assign a known material to this part.

is_colliding_with_part.information: Check if this part is colliding with another.

select_vertex_near_landmark.information: Select the vertex closest to a Landmark on the entity (in UI).

select_edge_near_landmark.information: Select an edge closest to a landmark on the entity (in UI).

select_face_near_landmark.information: Select a face closest to a landmark on the entity (in UI).

Sketch.information: Capabilities related to creating and manipulating 2D sketches, composed of vertices, edges and wires.

get_wires.information: Get a list of Wires in this Sketch.

clone.information: Clone an existing sketch with its geometry and properties. Returns the new Sketch.

create_line.information: Create a line between two points

create_line_to.information: Create a line between two points

create_arc.information: Create an arc. The radius is the distance from the center of the circle that forms the arc, to the chord tying start_at and end_at.

radius.information: The radius is the distance from the center of the circle that forms the arc, to the chord tying start_at and end_at.

radius_end.information: Specify a radiusEnd to make a conical or drafted spiral. Pass None to make a cylindrical spiral.

Vertex.information: A single point in space, or a control point.

get_control_points.information: Get a vertex's curve control points. This may not be applicable for some curve types.

set_control_points.information: Set a vertex's curve control points. This may not be applicable for some curve types.

points.information: A list of Points or coordinates describing the control points. The list must be the same size as the list returned by get_control_points().

Edge.information: A curve bounded by two Vertices.

offset.information: Clone and offset this edge a distance away from this one. This returns a new edge in the same sketch.

set_is_construction.information: Mark this edge for construction only.

get_is_construction.information: Check if this edge is for construction only.

get_normal.information: Get the normal created by this wire. Must be a closed wire.

get_edges.information: Return references to all the edges making up this wire.

get_vertices.information: Collapse all edges' vertices into one list.

get_is_closed.information: Checks if a wire is closed. Note: A closed wire is a Face or Surface.

loft.information: Create a surface between two Wires (Faces). If new_part_name is not provided, the two Wires' parents and the surface will be boolean union'ed, and the resulting Part will take the name of the first wire.

other.information: The other wire/face to loft to.

new_part_name.information: If provided, the resulting part will not be merged with the parent of this wire/face.

revolve.information: Revolve a Wire around another Entity or Landmark

extrude.information: Extrude a curve by a specified length. Returns a Part type.

sweep.information: Extrude this Wire along the path of another Wire

offset.information: Uniformly add a wall around a Wire. This returns a new wire in the same sketch.

profile.information: Bend this curve along the path of another

create_line.information: Create a line between two points

create_line_to.information: Create a line between two points

create_arc.information: Create an arc. The radius is the distance from the center of the circle that forms the arc, to the chord tying start_at and end_at.

radius.information: The radius is the distance from the center of the circle that forms the arc, to the chord tying start_at and end_at.

Landmark.information: Landmarks are named positions on an entity.

clone.information: Clone an existing Landmark with an optional offset, and reassignment to a different parent. Returns the new Landmark.

get_landmark_entity_name.information: Get the landmark object name in the scene, which may be different to the name of the landmark when it was first created. For example, the generated name may be {parentName}_{landmarkName}.

get_parent_entity.information: Get the name of the entity this landmark belongs to.

Joint.information: Joints define the relationships and constraints between entities.

pivot.information: Constraint the rotation origin of entity B to entity A's landmark.

gear_ratio.information: Constraint the rotation of entity B to be a percentage of entity A's

limit_location_xyz.information: Constraint the translation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limit_location_x.information: Constraint the translation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limit_location_y.information: Constraint the translation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limit_location_z.information: Constraint the translation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limit_rotation_xyz.information: Constraint the rotation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limit_rotation_x.information: Constraint the rotation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limit_rotation_y.information: Constraint the rotation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limit_rotation_z.information: Constraint the rotation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

Material.information: Materials affect the appearance and simulation properties of the parts.

get_preset.information: Get a material from a preset

set_color.information: Set the RGBA color of an entity. Supports 0-255 int or 0.0-1.0 float values.

set_reflectivity.information: Change the surface reflectivity (metallic luster) of the material.

set_roughness.information: Change the surface roughness of the material.

set_image_texture.information: Add a texture from an image file.

default.information: Get an Animation instance for the current scene.

set_frame_start.information: Set the start animation frame in the scene.

set_frame_end.information: Set the end animation frame in the scene.

set_frame_current.information: Set the current animation frame in the scene.

create_key_frame_location.information: Create an animation key-frame using the location of the entity.

create_key_frame_rotation.information: Create an animation key-frame using the rotation of the entity.

set_color.information: Set the color of an existing light.

create_perspective.information: Create a perspective camera in the scene.

create_orthogonal.information: Create an orthogonal camera in the scene.

create_panoramic.information: Create a panorama camera in the scene.

set_focal_length.information: Set the focal length of the camera.

Render.information: Render the scene and export images or videos.

render_video_frames.information: Render a video as image frame stills.

camera_name_or_instance.information: The camera name or Camera class instance.

Scene.information: Scene, camera, lighting, rendering, animation, simulation and GUI related functionality.

default.information: Get a Scene instance for the current scene.

get_selected_entity.information: Get the selected entity in the Scene.

export.information: Export the entire scene or specific entities.

set_default_unit.information: Set the document's default measurements system.

remove_from_group.information: Removes an existing entity from a group

assign_to_group.information: Assigns an existing entity to a new group

set_visible.information: Change the visibiltiy of the entity.

set_background_image.information: Set the scene background image. This can be an image or an HDRI texture.

Analytics.information: Tools for collecting data about the entities and scene.

get_world_pose.information: Returns the world pose of an entity.

get_bounding_box.information: Returns the bounding box of an entity.

get_dimensions.information: Returns the dimensions of an entity.
